titleInfo.title: The legacy of Bessie Dashiell: an informal account of nearly eighty years of dedicated interest, effort, and continuous financial support by three generations of the Rockefeller family to assist Memorial Hospital in the improvement of the care and treatment of victims of cancer, and in searching for causes, prenention, and cure of the dreaded disease.

mods.note: Copy 1: No. 36 of a limited edition of 50 privately printed copies; Copy 2: No. 11 of a limited edition of 50 privately printed copies.
Copy 1: Estate of Laurance S. Rockefeller; Copy 2: Source: George Lamb, family associate
